title: Study: Apple's Siri more distracting to drivers than Google Now, better than Microsoft Cortana
text:
Study: Apple's Siri more distracting to drivers than Google Now, better than Microsoft Cortana 
Published By: AppleInsider.com - Today 
As part of an ongoing study on the consequences of using hands- and eyes-free systems while driving, the AAA Foundation for Traffic Safety r...
